title: Robin Thick album art using popular font?
content:
After looking at a few different Robin Thicke-like character types. ..I came across the newest album art. I have used this font type numerous times and even seen it in various locations. After going through my font list. I am not sure what this classifies as I have seen a variation of this at dafont.com As to what the name of this font is ...ANY SUGGESTIONS ?

[http://cdn.idolator.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/06/14/robin-thicke-blurr...](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819220754/http:/cdn.idolator.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/06/14/robin-thicke-blurred-lines-album-cover-art-400x400.jpg "http://cdn.idolator.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/06/14/robin-thicke-blurred-lines-album-cover-art-400x400.jpg")
author: djstatusent
